Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
managers.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
Class that directly communicates with the database.

    • getConnection

      public void getConnection() throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Function that establishes a connection wih the database.

      ClassNotFoundException - if the driver cannot be found
      SQLException - if the tables cannot be created
